Instance.description: A drama node which is meant to be chosen from a drama node picker interaction. This allows us to use the drama scheduler to generate content for picker interactions.

TunableVariant.name: associated_sim_filter
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, will associate a sim with this drama node. Because they do not have receivers or senders, picker drama nodes do not support the normal flow for non-simless drama nodes.

TunableVariant.name: associated_sim_name_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled and tuned, this string will be used for the name of the associated Sim.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The string to use in place of the associated Sim's name. This is currently only supported by Mission Gigs.

TunableVariant.name: associated_sim_thumbnail_background
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the background behind the Associated Sim's thumbnail, or the thumbnail override, will use this image.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The image to use for the Associated Sim's background.

TunableVariant.name: associated_sim_thumbnail_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, an override thumbnail can be used in place of the tuned Associated Sim Filter.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The image to use for the Associated Sim's thumbnail.

TunableTuple.name: schedule_career_gig
TunableTuple.description: A gig to schedule should the player pick this to run.

Tunable.name: allow_add_career
Tunable.description: If tuned, picking this drama node will add the required career if the sim doesn't already have it. If not tuned, trying to add a gig for a career the sim doesn't have will throw an error.

TunableTuple.name: schedule_decorator_gig
TunableTuple.description: A decorator gig to schedule should the player pick this to run.

Tunable.name: allow_add_career
Tunable.description: If tuned, picking this drama node will add the required career if the sim doesn't already have it. If not tuned, trying to add a gig for a career the sim doesn't have will throw an error.

TunableTuple.name: schedule_drama_node
TunableTuple.description: Drama node to schedule should the player pick this to run.

Tunable.name: disable_if_visibility_tests_fail_with_tooltip
Tunable.display: Disable If Visibility Tests Fail With Tooltip
Tunable.description: If checked, when the Visibility Tests fail and a tooltip is provided, this entry will show in the picker but be disabled. This tuning works independently of the Disable Row If Visibility Tests Fail tunable in Drama Node Picker Interaction.

TunableEnum.name: on_pick_behavior
TunableEnum.description: Determines what happens to this PickerDramaNode if it is picked in a picker.

Tunable.name: replace_if_removed
Tunable.description: If True, whenever we remove this node because it was selected in a picker, we will replace it with a new valid node from the same bucket.

TdescFragTag.name: visibility_tests
TdescFragTag.description: Tests that will be run on the picker owner of this PickerDramaNode to determine if this node should appear in a picker.
